article.title: General Dynamics Awarded $18 Million Gun System Contract by Raytheon
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: General Dynamics Armament and Technical Products has received an $18 million contract from Raytheon Missile Systems to produce gun systems for the Phalanx Block 1B Close-in-Weapon System (CIWS) and the Centurion Land-Based Phalanx CIWS.
